titleStmt.title: Two letters from his excellencie Robert, Earl of Essex the one unto the speaker of the House of Commons : relating the true state of the late skirmish at Chinner between a party of the Kings and Parliaments forces on the sabbath day the 19
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Edw. Husbands ...,

notesStmt.note: Both letters had already appeared separately.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
